title: The Hog Trail Murders /// Part 1 /// 600
description:
The Hog Trail Murders /// Part 1 /// 600

Part 1 of 2 

www.TrueCrimeGarage.com

Wow! 600 episodes of True Crime Garage in the books but as you will hear it was lost on both of us until the conversation started flowing. Thank you all for helping the Garage to hit this milestone! The Hog Trail Murders refers to series a murders that took place in the Southwest District of Florida from 1994 - 1996. Warning this is some pretty gruesome stuff. Today we take a look at the crimes as people working and living in two Florida counties begin finding the bodies of victims that were left in the woods and on the Hog Trails.

Beer of the Week - Pulp Friction by Motorworks Brewing

Garage Grade - 3 and 3 quarter bottle caps out of 5 

Our show - True Crime Garage “Off the Record” is available only on Stitcher Premium. For a FREE month of listening go to http://stitcherpremium.com/truecrimegarage and use promo code GARAGE
author: truecrimegarage@gmail.com (TRUE CRIME GARAGE)
